verbose_text: IRE1alpha is a serine threonine protein kinase and endoribonuclease that, upon activation, initiates the unconventional splicing of the mRNA encoding XBP-1 [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: IRE1alpha is a serine-threonine protein kinase and endoribonuclease that, upon activation, initiates the unconventional splicing of the mRNA encoding XBP-1
